CustomField.description: Field identifies users as VIP for the GBS Community; this field, when checked, will enable users to see categories that the user would not otherwise have the ability to see. Further, this field may drive tighter SLAs.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Field identifies users as VIP for the GBS Community; this field, when checked, will enable users to see categories that the user would not otherwise have the ability to see. Further, this field may drive tighter SLAs.
CustomField.label: GBS VIP User
